item.title: Punches and the lower back
item.description: Sensei helped me figure out that my punches are all wrong, and the issue has been traced to lower back muscles. Thankfully, I've got tons of subway time now, so I can practice standing. For those of you who don't study martial artsâ€¦ That last sentence is not a joke.
